loans.name: Adelia

texts.es:
Adelia ya va por su tercer credikiva y desde la ciudad de Bogotá agradece a sus financiadores por la ayuda que le han brindado; ella está muy satisfecha, porque ahora tiene volantes promocionales y se ha dado a conocer mucho más y todo se lo debe a los financiamientos a través de Kiva, a través de los cuales que ha logrado más ventas de forros para muebles. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo financiamiento para renovar su registro mercantil, porque ahora sus nuevos clientes potenciales son empresas con las que planea   hacer negociaciones   y también comprará   materia prima como yacar y espuma en mayor volumen, pues necesita producir  forros para muebles y responder a pedidos para seguir construyendo éxitos. Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Adelia puede ingresar a los siguientes enlaces:
http://kiva.org/lend/202261
http://kiva.org/lend/247153
texts.en:
Adelia is in her third credikiva cycle and from the city of Bogotá sends her thanks to all the lenders for their help.  She is very happy since she now has promotional flyers and is much more well known thanks to Kiva loans, which have helped her increase furniture upholstery sales.  She now is applying for a new loan to renew her mercantile licence since her potential new customers are companies.  She will have to negotiate with them and buy raw materials such as jacquard fabric and foam rubber in higher volumes. She must incease her upholstery services to fill orders so she can continue growing her business.  If you would like to learn more about Adelia's background, you can following these links:
http://kiva.org/lend/202261
http://kiva.org/lend/247153

loans.use: To buy larger volumes of raw materials such as jacquard fabric and foam rubber.

loans.name: Eris Viht

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC”; La socia vive en el distrito de Huanchac; en la provincia de Cusco,  departamento del Cusco.

La  socia Eris Viht, la socia  tiene 37 años de edad y La socia es conviviente; La socia  tiene 2 hijos, de 5,9 meses de edad;  La socia es docente de profesión, la socia es docente primaria, la socia desea el crédito para invertir en su vivienda, la socia comprara cemento para poder terminar una pequeña construcción que inicio en su casa, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de cemento. 

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito que le otorgarán y de este modo podrá  mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC".  She lives in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cusco.

Eris Viht, 37, has a common-law partner and two children, ages 5 and 9 months.  She is a primary school teacher and has requested a loan for home improvement.  She plans to use the loan to buy cement so she can finish a small project she began in the house.

She is very grateful for the loan, which will improve her lifestyle, and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy cement.

loans.name: Hasifa

texts.en:
Hasifa lives in the city of Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has 5 children, all of whom are in school, and she also takes care of additional family members (father). Hasifa has operated a restaurant for 3 years, and she works 6 days out of every week. She sells her products at the market. Hasifa has requested a loan of 700,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bananas, beef, rice and sweet potatoes.

Hasifa also generates additional income selling soft drinks. Her main business challenges include the ever-increasing prices of food and thieves. Her goals and hopes for her business are to own a fully stocked restaurant and to build her own rental house. Hasifa lives in a home that she rents; she has no access to electricity nor to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food for the family

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs such as bananas, beef, rice and sweet potatoes.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: La Sra. Beatriz, vive en la meseta D. Achumani y vive con sus dos hijos ya profesionales, uno D. ellos viaja constantemente, ella se dedica a la repostería, elaboración D. galletas, donas tortas, hace mas D. 20 años, elabora queques, tortas y humintas, que reparte en las confiterías D. la zona central y zona sur, es una cliente que trabaja con Emprender desD. el año 2002 , es una cliente muy responsable, y trabajadora, ya que al margen D. esa actividad se dedica a la venta D. refrescos y abarrotes, con el dinero del crédito comprara harina, levadura, etc. para la elaboración D. sus galletas, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Beatriz lives on the Achumani plateau. She lives with her two children who are already professionals, one of whom is constantly traveling. Her work is making baked goods. For more than 20 years, she has maD. cookies, cakes, donuts, tortes and humitas [corn cakes], which she delivers to the pastry shops in the central and southern zones. She has been a client of Emprender since 2002, and she is a very responsible and hard-working client, since in addition to this activity she also works selling soft drinks and groceries. With the funds from the loan she will buy flour, yeast, etc. to prepare her cookies. She is grateful to the institution for the support provided to her.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast and other supplies.

loans.name: Shagufta's Group

texts.en:
Shagufta got married a few years ago and has given birth to three children. All of them are very young and have not started their education yet. She is a housewife and stays at home doing her household work. She is a very active and supportive person and always ready to help her family in the time of need. 

Her husband has a business selling groceries. His shop is located in the market and he sells different grocery items such as flour, rice, sugar and spices to his customers. His rates are reasonable and he is also very good in customer dealings; that’s why he has a good number of customers in the region. 

Shagufta has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband who wants to improve his business. With the loan, he will buy groceries in bulk to be able to fulfill the demand of his customers and earn better profit. She is hopeful that an investment will bring positive changes to her husband’s business and it will help her family to sustain itself financially.  

She is a new loan applicant and this is her first loan application with Asasah.

loans.use: To buy groceries for grocery shop business.

loans.name: Zainab's Group

texts.en:
Zainab is 44 years old and married and has a 20-year-old son and a 12-years-old daughter. Her son is a laborer while her daughter stays at home and helps Zainab perform her household duties. Zainab couldn’t educate her children due to financial constraints. 

Her husband is involved in agriculture. He grows different seasonal crops in his land and sells to customers. He works very hard to fulfill the needs of his family. 

Zainab has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her husband’s business. He will utilize the loan in buying fertilizers, seeds and pesticides to grow better crops and increase his profits. He has been operating this business for the past six years and Zainab is hopeful that an investment will bring positive changes to his business. 

She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 2nd loan application. In the previous loan year, she established a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticides for agriculture business.

loans.name: Miselida

texts.es: Miselida, de 59 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su querida hija menor Diana de 25 años y lo que más desea es trabajar muy duro para mejorar su calidad de vida. Cocinando sus ricos platillos que consiste en pollo frito y papas fritas y hamburguesas, Miselida pasa sus días expendiendo estos alimentos. Ella disfruta mucho de cocinar y lo hace con mucha habilidad, su comida es comprada por muchos clientes, los cuales acaban con los deliciosos platillos en unos segundos. Para el futuro de su negocio espera tener un restaurante, donde pueda vender todo el día y con mayor tranquilidad la comida que prepara, por que actualmente solo lo hace por la noches, aunque tiene 8 años de experiencia en esta actividad, todavía le sigue siendo difícil atender a todos los clientes que tiene, con todo el esfuerzo que realiza espera poder salir adelante y mejorar su vida. Este es el octavo crédito con MFP y esta ahorrando para pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, donde se siente muy contenta. Con dos mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ingredientes para preparar sus ricos platillos, con el resto del dinero comprará mesas y sillas para amoblar el restaurante que tanto desea tener.
texts.en: Miselida, 59 years old, is a friendly and hard-working woman. She lives in her own house along with her dear, youngest daughter, Diana, who is 25. What she wishes for most is to work very hard to improve her quality of life. Cooking her delicious dishes that consist of fried chicken, french fries and hamburgers, Miselida passes her days selling these meals. She enjoys cooking a lot and she does it well. Her food is bought by many customers, who return for seconds for the delicious dishes. For the future of her business, she hopes to have a restaurant where she may sell the food she prepares all day and with greater tranquility since currently she only does it at night. Although she has eight years' experience with this work, she still finds it difficult to attend to all the customers that she has. With all the effort she makes, she hopes to be able to get ahead and improve her life. This is her eighth loan with MFP and she is saving to pay back on time since she does not want to cause problems to the members in her community bank where she feels very happy. With the 2,500 new "soles" requested, she will buy more ingredients to prepare her delicious dishes. With the rest of the money, she will buy tables and chairs to furnish her restaurant that she wants to have so much.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare dishes, as well as to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: La Sra. María es una cliente joven, ella tiene un hijo pequeño de 8 meses, el esposo trabaja de albañil, ella se dedica a la venta de leche de vaca, tiene al momento dos vacas, y requiere el crédito para compra de forraje, ya que como llega época de invierno deben almacenar el alimento para su ganado vacuno, ella vive en la casa de sus padres, y sus vacas se encuentran en esta época pastando por los cerros aledaños y en época de invierno en su casa, ya que tiene un patio amplio y ordeña de 10 a 15 litros por día, lo que depende también del forraje que reciben los animales, el seseo de la Sra. Maria es el poder crecer en su actividad comprando mas vacas y poder comprase su casita propia, por este motivo se solicita el financiamiento ella es una persona muy trabajadora, con ganas de superación y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: María is a young customer. She has a small, eight-month-old son. Her husband works as a bricklayer. She is dedicated to selling cow's milk. At the moment, she has two cows and requires the loan in order to buy forrage since the winter season is coming and she ought to store food for her cattle. She lives in her parents' house and her cows can be found in this season grazing in the surrounding hills and in the winter, at her house since she has a large patio and milks 10-15 liters per day, which is also dependent on the forrage that the animals receive. Maria's wish is to be able to grow her work buying more cows and to be able to buy herself her own little house. For this reason, she is requesting the loan. She is a very hard-working woman, with desires to get ahead and is thankful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy forrage.

loans.name: Vanesa

texts.es: Vanesa, de 32 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Henry de 34 años y sus 2 queridos hijos Rosa de 14 y Jorge de 2 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El negocio de Vanesa esta ubicado en su propia casa, su puesto de comida es muy concurrido por las personas que desean servirse un delicioso platillo nocturno, siendo su especialidad los Juanes y el Tacacho (Platillos típicos de la selva peruana), platillos con los cuales se ha hecho muy conocida entre sus comensales. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cocinar, ya que desde muy pequeña tuvo esta afición. Lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es atender a todos sus clientes al mismo tiempo. Con el tiempo, espera juntar el dinero necesario para poner un restaurante, donde pueda brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Por ello solicita la ayuda de todos ustedes para que pueda desarrollar su negocio de venta de comida. Este será el quinto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que invertir bien el dinero si quiere que su negocio progrese, en su banco comunal es una socia muy alegre y activa. Con los dos mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ingredientes para preparar sus deliciosos platillos.
texts.en: Vanesa, 32 years old, is a friendly and hard-working woman. She lives in her own house along with her husband, Henry, 34, and their two dear children, Rosa who is 14 and Jorge who is 2, to whom she wishes to provide a better quality of life. Vanesa's business is located in her own house. Her food stall is well trafficked by people who wish to serve themselves a delicious dish at night, her specialties being Juanes and Tacacho (typical dishes of the Peruvian jungle), dishes with which she has made herself well known among her diners. What she likes most about her job is to cook since since she was young she had this hobby. She has been doing this activity for two years and considers the most difficult part is attending to all her customers at the same time. With time, she hopes to put together the necessary money to start a restaurant where she can provide better service to her customers. For this, she is requesting the help of all of you so she may develop her business selling food. This will be her fifth loan with MFP. She knows that she has to invest the money well if she wants her business to progress. In her community bank, she is a happy and active member. With the 2,500 new "soles" requested, she will buy more ingredients to prepare her delicious dishes.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for the preparation of food.

loans.name: Umurava Group

texts.en:
Leoncie is 27 years old, and she is not yet married. She owns a general store in which she sells many items that are commonly used at home such as soap, sugar, salt, matches and so on. Generally the group members own small businesses in their homesteads. The group is made up of mostly women and a few men. They usually combine their businesses with farming when it's farming season.

Leoncie is requesting a loan to buy more items such as sugar, soap, salt, matches, etc.

loans.use: to buy items such as sugar, matches, etc.

loans.name: Solmara

texts.es: La Señorita Solmara  tiene como actividad venta de productos de limpieza y enlatados  (detergentes, lavandinas, desinfectante; como también Aceite, viandadas y pañales para bebes), Su venta es de puerta a puerta y recorre todas las tiendas de su zona, actualmente ella abrirá una tienda para la venta de sus productos en la misma zona donde ella vive, Zona Villa El Carmen, una zona comercial que esta cerca de la cumbre camino a los yungas, su actividad  está muy bien administrada su familia esta compuesta por su mamá quien también trabaja de la misma manera y su hermano menor. Solmara es una persona responsable, agradecida y emprendedora el objetivo del crédito solicitado es el de tener una tienda para ampliar su mercado y compra de mercadería en pañales para bebe, es un apersona con ganas de superacion y de esta manera lograra  salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Solmara engages in selling cleaning products and canned goods (detergents, bleaches, disinfectants, as well as oil, canned meat and baby diapers). She sells door to door visiting every shop of her area. She will soon open a shop to sell her products in the same place where she lives, Villa El Carmen, a business area close to La Cumbre, on the way to Los Yungas (the warm valleys of Bolivia). She manages her activity in a good way. Her family is composed of her mother, who engages in the same activity, and a younger brother. Solmara is a responsible, appreciative and resourceful woman. The loan she is requesting will be used to open a shop to extend her market and to buy products such as baby diapers. She is a woman who wants to improve herself and to succeed, thanks to this improvement, in getting on in life and in improving her standard of living.

loans.use: To open a shop and to buy products to sell such as baby diapers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase two cases of Fanta, two scales, a refrigerator, and a  saucepan for his restaurant

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 24 años, es una joven madre de familia muy amable y sencilla, vive en su casa propia junto su esposo Julio de 27 años y su querido hijo Smith de 5 años, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro. El negocio al que María se dedica es la venta de zapatos y lo realiza en la calle, desde entonces recorre las calles de la ciudad de Pucallpa, en busca de clientes que deseen comprar. Los zapatos lo adquieren por catálogo y hace el pedido a su distribuidor mayorista, es por eso que los modelos que vende son muy novedosos y llamativos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es vender y se siente muy feliz cuando vende toda su mercadería. Lleva 8 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los zapatos, ya que las cajas que trae son muy pesadas y la cansan mucho, espera tener con el tiempo una tienda de calzados donde pueda vender con mayor comodidad a sus clientes. Este será el octavo crédito con MFP y espera poder pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo, al igual como hizo con sus primeros pagos. En su banco comunal es una socia muy querida, ya que siempre esta preocupada por el bienestar del resto de sus socias. Con los mil cuatrocientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más zapatos, para brindarles a sus clientes una mayor variedad de donde elegir.
texts.en: María, 24, is a friendly and sensible young mother. She lives in her own home alongside her husband, Julio, 27, and their dear son Smith who is 5, to whom they wish to provide a better future. The business that Maria is dedicated to is selling shoes, which she does in the street. She walks the streets of the city of Pucallpa in search of customers who wish to buy. She acquires the shoes from a catalog and places orders to her wholesale distributor. Is is for this that the models that she sells are very new and known. What she likes most about her work is to sell and to feel very happy when she sells all of her merchandise. She has been doing this work for eight years and finds transporting the shoes the most difficult part since the boxes that she brings are very heavy and tire her a lot. She hopes to have, in time, a shoe shop where she can sell with greater comfort to her customers. This will be her eighth loan with MFP and she hopes to be able to pay all of her payments on time, the same as she did with her first payments. In her community bank, she is a cherished member since she is always concerned with the wellbeing of the rest of the members. With the 1,400 new "soles" requested, she will buy more shoes in order to provide her customers with greater variety from which to choose.

loans.use: to buy more shoes.

loans.name: Gherzon Rodney

texts.es: El señor Gherzon  es un cliente joven recomendado por una cliente antigua y responsable, el se dedica a brindar servicio técnico en sistemas y a arreglar computadoras, a pesar de su juventud demuestra responsabilidad en su trabajo, el comenzó a trabajar desde sus 10 años en este rubro logrando con la práctica gran experiencia y conocimiento, vive en la zona de villa nueva potosí junto a su mama, siendo totalmente independiente, también percibe un sueldo fijo porque trabaja por las mañanas y por las tardes en una tienda. Solicita el credito para la compra de material para el arreglo de computadoras. En un futuro Gherzon piensa dedicarse independientemente a brindar servicio técnico en sistemas en un ambiente más grande atendiendo a sus clientes.
texts.en: Gherzon is a young borrower who has been recommended by an old and responsible customer. He engages in offering technical services in computer engineering and in repairing computers. Despite being young he is very responsible in his job. He started working when he was 10 in this field obtaining a significant experience both by practice and by knowledge. He lives in the Villa Nueva Potosì area with his mother, and he is completely economically independent. He also earns a fixed wage by working in a shop in the mornings and at nights. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy materials to repair computers. In the future, Gherzon plans on engaging completely in offering technical services in computer engineering, running a bigger shop where to tend to his customers.

loans.use: To buy meterials to repair computers.

loans.name: Magalis

texts.es: Magalis vive en el municipio D. Soledad con su esposo y tiene 4 hijos en las edades D. 25 a 35 años; ella es la propietaria  un negocio donD. fabrica artesanias en cerámica, el cual  inció  basada en su experiencia D. hace 20 años pues tiene gran conocimiento D. este oficio y D. como hacer negocios. En su taller Magalis  fabrica recordatorios,  adornos para L. diferentes espacios domésticos, flores, cofres y hasta lamparas, susprincipales clientes se encuentran en el sector donD. resiD. y en otras localidadades a las cuales ha sido referídos por sus compradores;  ella realiza las ventas principalmente D. contado,  aunque tambien maneja clientes especiales a crédito a quienes le otorga 15 dias D. plazo para recuperar prontamente su inversión con su respectiva utilidad. Su principal meta es adquirir una vivienda propia y por eso  vive entusiasmada en aumentar su capital D. trabajo, esta es la razón por la cual se acerca a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para acceder a un credikiva, el cual es el primer financiamiento que solicita y comprará materiales D. contado y en volumen, para adquirir descuentos que puedan disminuír sus costos D. producción y finalmente le D. la oportunidad a ella D.  trasladar a sus clientes un precio D. ventas   que llame su atención  y sostenerse  en el mercado  con la calidad con la que ella trabaja.
texts.en:
Magalis lives in the town of Soledad with her husband; she has four children aged 25 to 35. Magalis is the owner of a ceramics business which she has run for twenty years so has a lot of knowledge of both the work and the business skills she needs. In the workshop Magalis makes keepsakes, household ornaments, flowers, jewelry boxes, and lamps. Most of her customers live in her neighbourhood but some live in other areas and have been referred to her.

Her customers generally pay cash although there are a few special clients who have a credit account and make payments every fifteen days. Magalis's goal is to own a house so she is very keen to increase working capital. This is the reason she approached the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to obtain credit, her first loan. She plans to use the money to buy supplies with cash and in large quantities so that she can get them at a cheaper price and thus reduce production costs. She can then give her customers an attention-grabbing price and remain competitive in the market while maintaining the quality of her work.

loans.use: to buy supplies with cash and in large quantities

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy margi, palm oil, frying oil, tomatoes, peppers, salt, etc. in large quantity to add to her business

loans.name: Mary V.'s Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone is pleased to present to you the teachers of the Sierra Leone International Mission Secondary School from Waterloo. Waterloo is a small town near Freetown where “Shine on Sierra Leone” has partnered with SMT to open a branch.  This school is staffed with 30 employees and has an enrollment of 1,500 pupils. 

These hard working and dedicated teachers have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to seek a loan of SLL 5,600,000. With the help of this loan, these teachers can embark on some meaningful projects that their mere salaries alone cannot do. Some of them will use the loan to buy pieces of furniture, others to buy house-building materials or a piece of land, or to pay school fees for their children, while some of them will invest the loan in business. 

Mary is the leader of this group of teachers. Born in Makeni city, today Mary is living in Waterloo together with her husband and child. Mary has served in the teaching profession for many years now. She requested a loan in order to buy house-building materials to complete the building processes she has begun.

loans.use: to buy house-building materials to complete the building she began

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: El señor Antonio es transportista propietario de un radio taxi, el vive junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar en la zona el kenko, con mucho esfuerzo lograron comprar un terreno en el cual construyeron su casa,  ahora el quiere invertir el dinero solicitado para el pago al albañil para la culminacion de su casita, puesto que  el piensa mucho en dar comodidad a su familia. El espera que con el tiempo sus hijos puedan estudiar y tener un mejor futuro, don Antonio es un buen cliente y es la cuarta vez que solicita crédito en la institución y lo solicita para construcción de su casa, es una persona muy trabajadora y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado
texts.en: Antonio is a driver and he owns a radio taxi. He lives in the El Kenko neighborhood with his wife and their three children, who go to school. With great efforts they succeeded in buying some land on which they had their house built; he now wants to use the loan he is requesting to pay a mason to finish building his house, as he is deeply concerned with giving his family with a comfortable place to live. He hopes that in time his children will be able to study and have a better future. Antonio is a good customer, and this is the fourth time he is asking a loan to the institution. The loan he is requesting will be used to complete his house. He is a very hardworking man, and he is thankful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: To pay a mason to finish building his house.

loans.name: Alvaro

texts.es:
Álvaro es una persona muy conocida  en la comunidad de la Garita  de Guanacaste.
El tuvo un sueño desde niño y era tener su propio de negocio de tapicería. Hace poco logró  alcanzar su sueño, y hoy es dueño de  una de las empresas más importantes de la comunidad.
Su taller de tapicería ha sido un éxito y es por eso que necesita   ampliar su negocio y a mejorar su servicio cada vez más. Es por eso que el solicita un préstamo de  ₡500 000 (quinientos mil colones) para la compra de Esponjas, telas para sillones, clavos y demás materiales que necesita para su taller.
Esta feliz porque este negocio le ha permitido trabajar con la familia y pasar más tiempo con ellos. 
Alvaro es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal La Garita, una de las 110 empresas socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Álvaro is a very well-known member of the community of la Garita de Guanacaste.
Since he was a child, he dreamt of running his own upholstery workshop, and recently he has succeeded in making his dream come true: today, he is the owner of one of the most important companies of his community.
His upholstery workshop has been very successful, and for this reason he needs to expand his shop and improve his service even more. This is why he is requesting a loan of 500000 CRC to buy pieces of foam, fabric for armchairs, nails and other materials he needs for his shop.
He is very happy because he engages in this activity with his family, which allows him to spend more time with them.
Álvaro is a member of Empresa de Crédito Comunal La Garita, one of the 110 companies associated with EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: To buy pieces of foam and fabric for armchairs.

loans.name: Perveen's Group

texts.en:
Perveen has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband. He is an animal seller by profession .He will use the loan money to buy goats to raise and sell to butchers. He has been doing this business for the past five years and Perveen is very confident that her husband will be able to  increase his profits successfully after the loan investment.
 
Perveen herself is a seamstress who sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She is very skillful and receives a good number of orders every month. She has given birth to a seven-year-old daughter. She hasn’t started her education yet and stays with her mother at home. Perveen wants to send her to school after increasing her household income.

loans.use: To buy goats for animal-sales business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to make improvements in a plot of land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sherbets, minutas and popsicles, as well as tires for his small cart.

loans.name: Despertar Group

texts.es:
Éste banco comunal se llama “Despertar” está conformado por 18 emprendedores que se desempeñan en diferentes negocios, los cuales son venta de ropa interior, venta de miel y legumbres, producción y venta de mermeladas, confección de cortinaje, fabricación de estructuras metálicas. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Talca. 
Erika quien en la foto aparece sentada en primera fila y ocupa el primer puesto de izquierda a derecha, viste una casaca color blanco y un pañuelo color lila en el cuello, ella se dedica a vender ropa de segunda mano en su casa durante todo el día y los fines de semana, vende ropa en una feria libre. Sus clientes son frecuentes por lo tanto ya los conoce y les brinda facilidades de pago. Ella compra su mercadería, específicamente dos fardos de ropa, cada tres meses en la ciudad de Santiago.
Erika en los próximos meses comenzará otro negocio y será la venta de confites, bebidas y sándwich, para ello está esperando que le entreguen un kiosco que ubicará afuera de un colegio, por lo que invertirá el dinero del crédito en mercadería para abastecer su nuevo negocio. Si éste no llegase a funcionar comprará más fardos de ropa para abastecer su primer negocio.
Sus metas son  concretar finalmente éste anhelo del nuevo negocio y darle trabajo a su nuera, así Erika tendrá la posibilidad de distribuir su tiempo de acuerdo a sus dos negocios. Además desearía que su negocio de venta de ropa se expandiera y poder fabricar un galpón en el patio de su casa para habilitarlo como tienda de ropa, con probadores y exhibidores incluidos.
Erika vive junto a su esposo, su hija de 18 años y su nieta de 9 años de edad. Sus sueños a nivel personal son tener un negocio independiente que le permita tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia. 
Ella está muy agradecida de Fondo Esperanza. Le gusta mucho participar de las reuniones, ya que aprende con las capacitaciones, además ha podido integrar estos conocimientos a su negocio, por lo que ahora distribuye sus gastos y se encuentra más organizado.
Talca pertenece a la región del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Despertar” (To Awaken) and is composed of 18 entrepreneurs who are in a variety of businesses such as: underwear sales, honey and vegetable sales, marmalade making and selling, drape and curtain making, metallic structure manufacturing.  All are from the city of Talca.

Erika, who in the photo appears seated in the first row on the first spot from left to right and is wearing a white jacket with a lilac kerchief around her neck, sells used clothes at home all day and on weekends at a farmers market.  Her customers are recurring so she knows them and gives them easy payment terms.  She buys her merchandise, specifically bundles of clothes, every three months in the city of Santiago.

In the next few months, Erika will start a new business selling snacks, beverages and sandwiches.  To do so, she’s awaiting delivery of a sales kiosk that she’ll set up outside a school.  She will, therefore, invest the loan money in merchandise to stock her new business.  If it doesn’t work out for her though, she’ll buy more bundles of clothes to stock her original business.

Her goals are to finally be able to make the new business a reality and to provide work for her daughter-in-law while Erika will be able to split her time among both businesses.  Besides, she’d like her clothing sales business to expand and to build a shed in her yard to set it up as a clothing store with dressing rooms and display cases included.

Erika lives with her husband, her 18-year-old daughter and 9-year-old granddaughter.  Her dream on a personal level is to have an independent business that will allow her to have a better quality of life for her family.

She is very grateful to Fondo Esperanza.  She likes taking part in the meetings very much because she learns from the trainers.  Besides, she’s managed to apply what she’s learned to her business; she now spreads out her expenses and is more organized.

Talca is part of the Maule region located in the center of our country.  It is the region’s administrative, economic and cultural center being the most important city in Chile’s Central Valley.  There is a curious reference to Talca in Chile, the phrase: “Talca, Paris and London.”  Among the myths relating to it, some say it derives from what an Englishman once said: “Talca parece Londres,” because of the abundant fog that frequently covers the city in winter like in the capital of the United Kingdom.

loans.use: to buy snacks, beverages and clothes.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es: Gustavo, de 23 años, es un joven padre de familia muy amable, vive en casa de sus padres junto a su esposa Mariela de 17 años y su querido hijo Ken de 2 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Gustavo es la compra y venta de pescado, su constante animo de superación ha hecho que incursione en este negocio y poco a poco se ha hecho muy conocido, ya que él vende el pescado más fresco del mercado y es un vendedor muy alegre, que siempre recibe a sus clientes con una sonrisa. Lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad y lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes. Espera tener en el futuro un pequeño frigorífico donde pueda vender pescados sin temor a que se malogren con el calor del sol. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, se siente muy feliz por haberlo obtenido y espera poder pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo, en su banco comunal es un socio muy querido, por la alegría que pone en el grupo. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, hará arreglar su congeladora, ya que con el paso de los años ha ido fallando, asimismo comprará más pescado para tener más mercadería para vender.
texts.en: Gustavo is 23 years old and is a young father.  He is very friendly and lives at his parents’ house with his 17-year-old wife Mariela and their 2-year-old son Ken, for whom he wants to provide a better quality of life.  Gustavo works buying and selling fish.  His constant motivation to excel led him to enter this business and he has made himself very well-known over time, as he sells the freshest fish at the market and is a pleasant salesman who always greets his customers with a smile.  He has been in this business for four years and what he likes most about his work is chatting with his customers.  In the future, he hopes to have a small refrigerator so that he can sell his fish without having to worry about it going bad from the heat of the sun.  This will be his second loan with MFP and he is very happy to have been granted it.  He plans to make all of his payments on time.  He is very well-liked within his communal bank because of the cheerfulness he brings.  With the 1,500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) requested, he will fix his freezer as it does not work as well due to its age.  In addition, he will buy more fish so that he will have more merchandise to sell.

loans.use: to fix his freezer and buy more fish.

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem is 50 years old and has given birth to three sons. She couldn’t educate them due to financial constraints. Her husband is involved in the sweetmeat business. He runs a sweetmeat shop in the market where he offers good tasty sweetmeats to his customers; that’s why his sweetmeat products earn him good profits every month. 

Naseem has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy required ingredients such as milk, sugar, dried fruit and cooking oil etc  to make sweetmeats in larger quantity for sale.  

Naseem hopes that by investing loan money into her husband’s business her husband will be able to increase his profits. He has been in this business for the past 20 years.

loans.use: To buy required ingredients for sweetmeat-making business.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 22 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo William de 27 años y su querida hija Yaslin de 2 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El puesto de golosinas de Elena se encuentra ubicada en uno de los parques más concurridos de la ciudad de Pucallpa, su día normalmente comienza a las 8 de la mañana y termina pasadas las 6 de la tarde, y durante todo este tiempo ella aprovecha algunos minutos de poca venta para ir a ver a su hija, quien todavía es muy pequeña y necesita mucha atención. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene para realizar otras actividades, a la vez que cuida su puesto de golosinas, lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil de su trabajo es tener que permanecer bajo el inclemente sol todo el día. Espera que con el tiempo pueda poner una tienda donde pueda atender mejor a sus clientes. Este será el sexto crédito con MFP y se siente en la responsabilidad de pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que desea acceder a otros créditos posteriormente, en su banco comunal es una de las socias más activas. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más golosinas para implementar mejor su carretilla.
texts.en: Elena is 22 years old and is a very friendly and hardworking woman.  She lives in a house that she owns with her 27-year-old husband William and her 2-year-old daughter Yaslin, for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life.  Elena’s snack stand is located in one of the most popular parks in the city of Pucallpa.  Her day normally begins at 8am and ends after 6pm, but she takes advantage of slower times of business to see her daughter who is still very young and requires a great deal of attention.  What she likes most about her work is the freedom she has to do other things while she tends to her snack stand.  She has been in this business for two years and considers the most difficult part to be having to stay in the sun all day.  She hopes that over time, she can set up a store where she can better serve her customers.  This will be her sixth loan with MFP and she knows she needs to be responsible in making her payments on time since she wants to obtain other loans in the future.  She is one of the most active members of her communal bank.  With the 1,500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) requested, she will buy more snacks to better set up her stand.

loans.use: to buy more snacks to better set up her kiosk.

loans.name: Bashiraan's Group

texts.en:
Bashiraan is married with four sons and a daughter. Her daughter is a professional nurse while her sons are enrolled in school and getting their education. Her husband is a farmer and grows different seasonal crops. He works very hard all the day at his fields to fulfill the basic needs of his family. 

Bashiraan has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to boost her husband’s agriculture business. With the loan, he will purchase fertilizers, seeds and pesticides to get better results from his field and earn better profits. 

He has been doing this business for the past 20 years and Bashiraan is confident about the positive growth of her husband’s business and about the better financial future of her family. 

She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 3rd loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticides for agriculture business.

loans.name: Elida

texts.es: Elida, de 46 años es una mujer muy amable y sencilla, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Hermogenes de 48 años y sus 2 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El negocio de venta de golosinas de Elida esta ubicado en uno de los parques más importantes de la ciudad de Pucallpa, ella ha puesto todo su empeño en hacer de su pequeño negocio uno de los más concurridos por lo clientes, los cuales la prefieren a ella debido a la amabilidad con que los trata. Los 5 años que lleva en este negocio le han servido para ganarse un lugar preferencial en el parque, ya que esta ubicada en la esquina más transitada, donde es mucho más fácil de encontrarla, lo que más le gusta es conversar con sus vecinas de venta, pero lo que menos le gusta es tener que permanecer todo el día en su puesto sin poder ir a ningún lado, espera más adelante poner su tienda de golosinas, la cual le pueda dar mejores ingresos. Este será su décimo cuarto crédito con MFP, en sus primeros créditos fue muy puntual y espera poder serlo ahora también, en su banco comunal es una socia muy querida. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos para incrementar la mercadería que vende.
texts.en: Elida is 46 years old and is a very simple and friendly woman.  She lives in a house that she owns with her 48-year-old husband Hermogenes and their two children, for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life.  Elida’s snack business is located in one of the most important parks in the city of Pucallpa.  She has put all of her effort into making her business one of the most popular among customers, who prefer her due to her friendliness.  The five years she has been in this business have helped her to obtain a preferential location in the park, as she is located on the busiest corner where it is much easier to find her.  What she likes most is talking with her fellow saleswomen, but her least favorite part is having to stay at her stand all day without leaving.  In the future, she hopes to set up a snack store where she can earn more.  This will be her fourteenth loan with MFP.  She was very punctual in paying off her first loans and plans to do so now as well.  She is a very well-liked member of her communal bank.  With the 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) requested, she will buy more products to increase the merchandise she sells.

loans.use: to buy more products for her kiosk.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
Dolores, de 56 años, es una mujer muy amable y sencilla, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Eduardo de 67 años y lo que más desea es tener una vejez tranquila. El restaurante de Dolores es uno de los más concurridos de la ciudad de Pucallpa, todos los días sus clientes se dan cita en su restaurante para degustar los deliciosos platillos que prepara. Ella es una cocinera muy buena y es que desde muy pequeña le nació el amor por la cocina.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cocinar, es por eso que lo hace con mucho esmero, Sin embargo tener que atender a todos sus clientes no le da abasto. En adelante espera mejorar la infraestructura de su restaurante para que pueda ingresar más clientes. Este será el décimo quinto crédito con MFP, espera ser muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, ya que desea acceder a más créditos, en su banco comunal es muy participativa. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ingredientes para cocinar, ya que la demanda por su comida ha aumentado.
texts.en:
Dolores is 56 years old and is a very simple and friendly woman. She lives in a house that she owns with her 67-year-old husband Eduardo and what she wants most is to have a peaceful old age. Dolores’ restaurant is one of the most popular in the city of Pucallpa. Her customers get together in her restaurant to taste the delicious dishes she prepares. She is a very good cook and her love for the kitchen started at a very young age.

What she likes most about her work is cooking, which is why she does it with great care. However, tending to her customers doesn’t provide her with enough. In the future, she plans to improve her restaurant’s infrastructure so that it can hold more customers. This will be her fifteenth loan with MFP and she plans to be very punctual in making her payments, as she wants to obtain more loans. She participates a great deal in her communal bank. With the 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) requested, she will buy more ingredients to cook since the demand for her food has gone up.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to continue making her dishes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: Mónica, de 33 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Marlo de 35 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El puesto de golosinas de Mónica esta ubicada en su propia casa, su puesto es muy concurrido por sus clientes, ya que esta muy bien situada en su barrio y ella es muy conocida por su buen humor y carisma, lo cual ha hecho que sus ventas le den los ingresos que necesita. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y hacerlos reír, lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que vender bajo los fuertes rayos solares de la mañana, anhela tener una tienda de golosinas donde pueda vender con más comodidad. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP y esta dispuesta a pagarlo a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal en donde es muy querida por el resto de sus socias. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más golosinas para implementar mejor el stock de su carretilla.
texts.en:
Mónica is 33 years old.  She is a kind and hard-working woman who lives in her own home together with her husband, 35 year-old Marlo, and her three beloved children who she would like to provide with a better quality of life.

Mónica's candy stall is located in her own home.  It is very busy because it is very well located in her neighborhood and Mónica is very well known for her good humor and charisma.  As a result, her sales provide her with the income that she needs.  What Mónica most enjoys about her work is chatting to her customers and making them laugh.  She has been in this business for two years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be having to make her sales under the strong morning sun.  She dreams of owning a candy store where she can make her sales more comfortably.

This is Mónica's third loan from MFP and she is prepared to make her repayments on time since she doesn't want to cause problems for the other members of her community bank.  She is very well liked by her fellow members.  Mónica will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy more candies to better stock her stall.

loans.use: to buy more candies with which to stock her stall

loans.name: Sara Luz

texts.es: Sara  vive en el municipio de Soledad y tiene dos hijos en las edades de 22 y 24 años con los que sueña tengan un futuro exitoso y esta es su gran motivación,  por la cual trabaja persistentemente en su negocio de vender mercancia variada,  entre ropa, calzado toallas, jeanes y otros articulos; en esta ocasión  planea  comprar  mercancia especialmente para hombres, a propósito de la temporada del dia del padre que se acerca y genera un gran despliegue comercia que impacta las ventas de su negocio.  Sara inició su experiencia  de trabajo independiente,  vendiendo queso, en la medida en que aumetaron sus clientes, tomó esta  base de datos como referencia potencial,  para adicionar a su negocio la venta de mercancia    promocionandola entre ellos mismos  y cuando realizaron su negociociación con Sara  le recomendó nuevos compradores. En su negocio vende ropa, prendas de plata, sabanas, toallas, jeanes y muchos articulos mas,  dependiendo de lo que solicite su cliente. Sus ventas la realiza a credito y algunas de contado y sus compra a proveedores las hace en la medida en que recupera su inversión, esta es la razón por la cual acude a la Fundación Mario Santo Domino para  aumentar su capital de trabajo y con su credikiva comprar  una vitrina, ropa, toallas, jean encargados. Su sueño es adquirir  su vivienda y todos los dias se levanta aportandole a este propósito mucho trabajo, para finalmente poder lograrlo.
texts.en:
Sara lives in the town of Soledad and has two children aged 22 and 24.  She dreams of her children having a successful future.  This is her great motivation and why she works persistently in her business selling a variety of merchandise: clothes, footwear, towels, jeans and other items.

On this occasion, Sara is planning to buy merchandise aimed at men as Fathers Day is approaching and this great commercial opportunity positively impacts her sales.  

Sara started out in business selling cheese.  As she increased her number of customers, she added the sale of more goods to her business, promoting them to her customers.  As a result, they recommended new buyers to her.

In her business, Sara sells clothes, silver jewelry, sheets, towels, jeans and lots of other goods, depending on what her customers request.  She makes most of her sales on credit and some for cash.  She buys more products from her suppliers as she recoups her investment.  This is why she is approaching Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, so that she can increase her working capital and use her Kiva loan to buy a display case, clothes, towels, jeans and also fill orders.  Her dream is to buy her own home.  Every day she wakes up and puts a lot of work into this, so that she can finally achieve her goal.

loans.use: to buy a display cabinet and merchandise which she has orders for such as clothes, towels and jeans

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.en:
Tatyana is married with two daughters. She is a private entrepreneur selling retail items, i.e. children’s clothing and footwear in small markets of the Kherson region where she is from. Tatyana started this enterprise eight years ago. Presently, she has over 20,000 Grivnyas of turnover capital. Her net profit amounts to 6,500 Grivnyas a month. 

Tatyana is requesting a loan of 20,000 Grivnyas to purchase 100 pairs of assorted children’s footwear. She likes working with this type of merchandise. She is ready to work hard to see her business grow and expand further.

loans.use: to purchase 100 pairs of children’s footwear.

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is divorced. She has a grown son, Vladislav. Irina runs a small vending business selling men’s and women’s footwear in the markets of the Kherson region. Sixteen years ago Irina was forced to find ways to feed her family and this is when she ventured to start a business selling footwear. Currently, Irina has 75,000 Grivnyas of turnover capital. Her income amounts to 16,000 Grivnyas. 

Irina is seeking a loan of 15,000 Grivnyas to purchase 250 pairs of summer footwear for further retail sale in marketplaces of the Kherson region. Irina works with different groups of customers and always sets it as a priority to meet their demands and help them find what they are looking for.

loans.use: to purchase 250 pairs of summer footwear.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a natural gas tank for his vehicle

loans.name: Gloria Concepción

texts.es:
Gloria  es socia del Banco Comunal “3 de Mayo” ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia  El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 29 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos.  Tiene educación superior.
La señora cuenta que tiene un cafetín en un colegio muy conocido de su localidad, su préstamo anterior de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, lo invirtió íntegramente en su negocio.
Gloria solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 3000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de galletas, caramelos, chocolates, etc.,  también productos como arroz, azúcar, papa, carne y pollos, etc., para la preparación de alimentos que luego venderá en su cafetín.  La señora trabaja con un ayudante en el negocio ya que su esposo es músico y viaja a diferentes lugares de la ciudad.
Su sueño es tener un restaurant y un negocio de servicio de internet.
Lo que le  gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y lo que gana la cuenta interna.
texts.en:
Gloria is a member of the "3 de Mayo" community bank which is located in Ilave district, in El Collao province, in Puno department.  She is 29 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children.  She has a high school level of education.

Gloria tells us that she has a café in a very well-known high school in her town.  Her previous loan was for 300 Peruvian soles and she invested all of that money in her business.

Gloria is requesting a new loan for 3,000 soles to invest in buying cookies, candies, chocolates, etc.  She will also buy products such as rice, sugar, potatoes, meat, chicken, etc. to prepare the food that she will then sell in her café.  She works in her business with an assistant since her husband is a musician and travels to different parts of the city.

Gloria's dream is to own a restaurant and an Internet café.  What she most likes about her community bank is the ease of the loans and what she earns on the internal account.

loans.use: to buy cookies, candies, chocolates and also supplies for making food

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es:
Hilaria  es socia del Banco Comunal “3 de Mayo” ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia  El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos (2 independientes).  Ella cuenta con educación secundaria (incompleta).
Hilaria trabaja  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cinco años, su primer préstamo  solicitado de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, lo invirtió en su negocio venta de artefactos, joyas y relojes, la señora tiene un puesto de venta en la localidad de Juliaca.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles incrementará al capital que tiene y comprará artefactos como: calculadoras, reloj, radios, etc, también dice que se dedica a la compra y venta de carros en la ciudad de Puno, su esposo trabaja en una empresa como operario de construcción. 
Su sueño es tener más capital para mejorar el negocio.
Lo que le  gusta del Banco Comunal es la  facilidad del préstamo y las ganancias de sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Hilaria is a member of the "3 de Mayo" community bank which is located in Ilave district, in El Collao province, in Puno department.  She is 52 years old, married, and has four children (two of whom live independently).  She did not complete high school.

Hilaria has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for five years.  Her first loan was for 300 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her business selling small appliances, jewelry and watches.  Hilaria has a sales location in the town of Juliaca.   She will use this new loan for 1,000 soles to increase her capital and buy small appliances such as calculators, watches, radios, etc.  She says that she also buys and sells cars in the city of Puno.  Her husband works for a company as a construction worker.

Hilaria's dream is to have more capital so that she can improve her business.  What she likes about her community bank is the ease of the loans and the interest that she makes on her savings.

loans.use: to buy small appliances such as calculators, watches, radios, etc.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo, tiene la edad de 48 años, está casado y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposo que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de su frijol. El lo que quiere es mejorar su próxima cosecha y así poder obtener de su proyecto mejores ganancias. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de este cultivo, además el cuenta con la experiencia para producirlo y generarle ganancias. El quiere con esta mejora a su frijol generar divisas para el mantén y el bienestar familiar en su futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Gerardo is 48 years old, married, and lives with his wife and three children who are his main priorities.  He plans to use his loan to buy the supplies he needs to care for his bean crop.  What he would like is to improve his next harvest and thereby be able to make better profits.  He has a plot of land which is ideal for growing this crop.  He also has experience in growing it and making profits from it.  By improving his bean crop, he would like to make money with which to support his family and provide for their well-being in the future.

This is the first loan that Gerardo has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better repayment terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to care for his bean crop

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Isabel vive en la zona D. Trojes camino a Tiquipaya, al norte D. la ciudad D. Cochabamba, se dedica a la producción D. leche cruda para su venta en el mercado popular D. la localidad D. Trojes.
La señora Isabel es viuda, y tiene solo vive con sus nietos, ella trabaja para sus nietos quienes le acompañan mientras sus hijos trabajan, la señora Isabel trabajo mucho para sacar adelante a sus hijos, desD. muy joven que tiene su vacas empezó con 2 vacas y vendía los quesillos en el mercado D. Trojes y poco a poco fue comprando más vacas, ahora tiene 6 cabezas D. ganado lechero, y por la edad que tiene ella ya no comprar mas cabezas D. ganado sino lo que hara es heredar esas vacas a sus nietos porque ella esta ya cansada.
El lugar donD. tiene a sus vacas no cuenta con murralla y desea construirle una pequeña pared D. modo que su ganado este mas seguro, esa es la necesidad por la que la sra Isabel solicito el crédito.
Al tener mas seguridad con su ganado ella podrá, con mas tranquilidad dejar a su ganado sin pensar D. que pueD. sufrir robos posibles, si bien el monto que solicita no es alto, la Sra. Indica que es solo para comprar ladrillos.
texts.en:
Isabel lives in the Trojes zone on the way to Tiquipaya, which is north of the city of Cochabamba.  She produces raw milk to sell in the well-known market in Trojes.

Isabel is a widow, and she lives with her grandchildren.  She works for her grandchildren who are with her while her children work.  Isabel worked a lot in order to get her children ahead.  

She has had her cows since she was very young.  She started with two cows, and she sold cheese at the Trojes market.  Little by little she has been buying more cows.  She now has six head of dairy cows.  Due to her age, she will not buy more heads of cattle.  Instead, she will leave these cows to her grandchildren because she is tired now.

The place where she has her cows does not have a wall.  She wishes to build a small wall so that her livestock is safer.  This is the need that Isabel has for requesting the loan.  When her cows are safer, Isabel will have more peace of mind about leaving her livestock.  Then she will not worry that they will possibly be stolen.

The amount she is requesting is not much, and she says it is only to buy bricks.

loans.use: to build a wall to house her cows.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo, tiene la edad de 46 años, está casado y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposo que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia del su maíz y el frijol. El cuenta con el terreno ya sembrado de ambos cultivos y lo que quiere es poder asistirlo para así poder obtener mejores cosechas de los cultivos, aparte el terreno es apto para la buena explotación de estos cultivos. Quiere generar las ganancias para ir creciendo con el proyecto y así poderles dar a sus hijos un bienestar familiar de mejores condiciones en el futuro. También estas ganancias generar la tendrá para poderle seguir dando el estudio universitario a su hija mayor para que sea todo una profesional en su vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Gerardo is 46 years old and married.  He lives with his three children and his wife, and they are his greatest priority.  He intends to use the loan to buy supplies to help with his corn and beans.

He has land already planted with both crops.  He wants to be able to care for them in order to be able to get a better harvest from the crops.  The land is suitable for these crops.  He wants to generate income in order to keep growing with his plan.  That way he will be able to give his children better conditions in the future and familial well-being.

Also, with the income that is generated he will be able to continue giving his oldest daughter a university education.  This is so that she will be a complete professional in her live.

This is his first loan with FUDESCOSUR.  He has not had other loan with state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to care for his corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop computer.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: Martina tiene 54 años,  vive con su esposo y 2 de sus 5 hijos en su casa propia. Desde que era niño, sus padres le enseñaron la agricultura, actividad que por muchos años ha sido una fuente de ingresos para su familia. Actualmente lo sigue, siendo sus días dedicándose a la siembra, así como también en la venta de animales y leche. Entre los productos que cultiva principalmente son el maíz y la papa; sin embargo en esta actividad requiere de mucho esfuerzo por lo que tiene que contratar a jornaleros para que le ayuden en la siembra y en la cosecha. Al final sus productos son comercializados en la ciudad de Lima, pues ahí es donde recibe más ganancias.  Por otro lado trabaja de manera dependiente, como personal administrativo en un centro educativo, que se encuentra muy cerca de su casa, trabajo que le toma medio día, y el resto lo dedica a la actividad agrícola. En delante desea mejorar en la producción de sus cosechas, por ello espera que la ayuden con un pequeño aporte para que continúe en este trabajo. Este será su crédito número 18 con MFP, manifiesta que trabajar en un banco comunal es una de las mejores experiencias que ha tenido, porque le agrada ver a su grupo unido y bien organizado. Asimismo se compromete nuevamente a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono ya que sembrará alfalfa, que el alimento indispensable de sus animales.
texts.en:
Martina, 54, lives with her husband and two of her five children in her own house.  Since childhood her parents taught her to farm, an activity that has been a source of family income for many years.  She’s still in this line of work dedicating days to planting as well as in selling animals and milk.  Among the products she grows are corn and potatoes, mainly.  However, this activity requires a lot of effort so she must hire day laborers during harvest and planting to help her.  At the end, her products are sold in the city of Lima because that’s where the best profits are to be had.

On the other hand, she is employed as part of the administrative staff of a school that’s very near her home, a job that is half time; the rest of her time is spent on farming.  She’d like to improve her crops and hopes to be helped with a small contribution to continue with this work.

This will be loan #8 with MFP.  She states that working in a communal bank is one of the best experiences she’s had because it pleases her to see her group unified and well organized.  She once again commits to be very punctual with her payments.  She will use the requested loan to buy sacks of manure because she will plant alfalfa which is an indispensable food for her animals.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Mery Elizabeth

texts.es:
Mery  Elizabeth  es socia del Banco Comunal “3 de Mayo” ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia  El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos.  Ella estudió la secundaria.
La señora hace tres años que trabaja  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de abarrotes.  Actualmente se dedica a la venta de granos de la región (papa, chuño, quinua).
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 2500.00 nuevos soles comprará 50 arrobas de quinua.  La señora nos cuenta que sus productos los compra de Desaguadero y lo vende en la ciudad de Puno y Juliaca, su esposo trabaja en la chacra y con los ganados. 
Su sueño es tener una casa en Puno y un carro grande donde trasladar su mercadería.
Lo que le  gusta del Banco Comunal es la  facilidad del préstamo con meses de gracia y los ahorros.
texts.en:
Mery Elizabeth is a member of the “3 de Mayo” (May 3) communal bank located in Ilave District, El Collao Province and Puno Department.  She’s 29 years old, married and has two children.  She finished secondary school.

She’s been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the last three years.   Her initial loan was for 300 new soles and she invested it in her grocery sales business.  She currently sells grains from the region [potatoes, chuño (dehydrated, freeze dried potato), quinoa].  She will use this new, 2500 new sol, loan to buy 50 arrobas (1 arroba=11.5 kg. approx.) of quinoa.

She tells us that she buys her products in Desaguadero and sells them in the cities of Puno and Juliaca.  Her husband is a farmer and raises livestock.

Her dream is owning a house in Puno and a large car to transport her merchandise.  What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of the loans with month’s grace period and the savings.

loans.use: to buy 50 arrobas of quinoa.

loans.name: José Leandro

texts.es: Don Jose Leandro, es casado, tiene 30 años de edad, cursó sus estudios de educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos, 3 de los cuales estudian, se dedica a la artesanía,al tejido de cortes típicos, lleva 5 años de experiencia, inicio este trabajo siendo operario para otro negocio. Solicita un préstamos que le servirá para compra de mas materia prima, esta vez va a comprar hilo de diferentes clases y colores, de esta forma podrá cubrir la demanda de sus clientes y mejorar con su condicion de vida. En el futuro quiere contar con muchos operarios.
texts.en: José Leandro is married.  He’s 30 years old and completed elementary school.  He has five children three of whom are in school.  He’s a craftsman, he weaves traditional fabric.  He has five years experience having started this work as a laborer in another firm.  He is asking for a loan that will be used to buy more raw materials.  This time he’s going to buy yarn of various types and colors in order to better meet customer demand and improve his living conditions.  In the future he’d like to employ many workers.

loans.use: to buy yarn.

loans.name: Alicia Maria

texts.es: Alicia María, tiene la edad de 38 años, está casado y vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposo que son sus mayores prioridades. Ella pretende con el crédito comprar los materiales para hacerle a su casa una pequeña mejora. Ella lo que quiere es tener una mejor vivienda y tenerla en mejores condiciones para la vivencia en el hogar. Lo que pretenden es hacerle unos harreglos para poder tener más seguridad pues lo que le harán es cerrar unas partes de la casa donde se tienen utensilios de cocina y quedan al descubierto, ariesgando de poder perderlas. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Alicia María, 38, is married and lives with her three children and husband who are her main priorities.  She intends to use the loan to buy supplies to make a small improvement to her home.  She wants to have a better house and to have it in better living conditions.  What she is going to do is add security to it.  She will have part of the house, where she has kitchen utensils out in the open and in danger of being lost, closed off.

This is the first loan she’s gotten from FUDECOSUR.  She has had no previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has offered her the best loan terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to do some home improvements.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, se dedica a un taller de electrónica, él vive solo y ha instalado su propio taller en la vivienda, ahí repara equipos de sonido, radios, televisores, tiene muchos clientes y a parte del taller, también vende papas fritas los domingos.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo, el cual invertirá en reparación del equipo de soldadura, ya que es el que le ayuda a realizar sus reparaciones, por el momento está dañado, este préstamo le ayudara para cubrir el gasto y estar nuevamente con sus herramientas en buenas condiciones.
El aspira que a través del taller pueda comprar un mejor equipo para el taller, que le permita mejorar los servicios a los clientes.
texts.en:
Juan works in an electronics workshop.  He lives alone and has set up his own workshop in the house where he repairs stereos, radios, and televisions.  He has many customers and in part of the workshop he also sells french fries on Sundays.

He is currently requesting a loan, which he will invest in repairing his welding equipment. That is what helps to make repairs and for the moment it is damaged. This loan will help to cover the expense and be back with his tools in good condition.  He aspires to be able to buy better equipment for the workshop, which will improve services to customers.

loans.use: To repair the welding equipment

loans.name: Najla

texts.en:
Najla is a 56-year-old widow and the mother of three children. She is a very responsible and hardworking woman who does everything to provide her children the best standard of living ever. Najla works in agriculture, planting vegetables such as cucumbers, white peas and tobacco.

Najla had hard times when her husband died, as she was responsible for raising her three children. She has worked in agriculture since 1986. To increase her income and to cover her children's expenses, Najla is planning to open a grocery store. She has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, to help her cover all the opening and preparation expenses.

loans.use: To open a new business.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Mauricio, tiene la edad de 31 años, está casado y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El lo que pretende es realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia del maíz y el frijol que tiene sembrados. El cuenta con el terreno y la experiencia de los cultivos sembrados y lo que quiere es aumentar la producción asistiéndolos para así obtener mejores ganancias  y poder seguir adelante con el proyecto de granos básicos, creciendo como un agricultor de la zona y así poderle dar a su familia un mejor bienestar de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Mauricio, 31, is married and lives with his two children and his wife who are his main priorities.  He intends to use the loan to buy farming supplies to enhance his bean and corn crops.  He has the land and the experience farming and what he wants is to increase production by enhancing his planting to increase production and earn higher profits and thus be able to continue with his basic grains project growing as a farmer in the area and providing his family with better wellbeing.


This is the first loan he’s gotten from FUDECOSUR.  He has had no previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has offered him the best loan terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Meri

texts.es: Meri tiene 47 años, vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Hace más de 13 años que se dedica en la venta de artículos y químicos de limpieza, productos que los adquiere al por mayor y ella los distribuye en envases más pequeños para su venta. Entre los clientes que más tiene son aquellos que trabajan en limpieza y a la ama de casa, por lo que algunos de sus productos son repartidos a domicilio, pero la mayoría de las veces los vende en la calle. Durante estos años de trabajo, ha visto que le ha sido rentable este negocio, por lo que eso la motiva a seguir con esta actividad y convertirse en una gran distribuidora de productos de limpieza. Este será su crédito número 12 con MFP,  tiene amplia experiencia de trabajo solidario dentro de su banco comunal que le permite durante estos años tener un respaldo económico para desarrollar su negocio además de que comparte experiencias exitosas de emprendimiento de la cual esta muy agradecida, esta convencida de seguir siendo responsable en sus créditos porque desarrolla un buen historial y confianza en su persona. El dinero lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería en productos de limpieza.
texts.en:
Meri, 47, lives with her husband and two children in her own home. For over thirteen years she has worked selling cleaning supplies and chemicals, items which she obtains wholesale and distributes in smaller packages for resale. Among her customers are many who work in the cleaning business as well as housewives. Thus some of her products are delivered to the home, but most of the time she sells them on the street. 

Over the years of work she has found this business to be profitable, and so she has been motivated to go on to become a large distributor of cleaning products. This will be her twelfth loan with MFP. She has extensive experience in the cooperative efforts within her communal bank, which has provided her economic support over the years for developing her business, along with sharing experiences in successful entrepreneurship, for which she is very appreciative. She is convinced she will continue to be responsible with her loans because it develops a good history and confidence in her person. She will invest the money in purchasing more merchandise in cleaning products.

loans.use: to purchase more cleaning products.

loans.name: Walter Milton

texts.es:
Walter,es agricultor vive en casa propia junto a una hermana y tres sobrinas. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y chile, también a la crianza de ganado.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de plantas de chiles, abono y tratamiento para plagas, este préstamo le ayudara para sembrar este cultivo y realizar como cada año la siembra.
Él quiere mejorar sus cultivos, produciendo más y de esta manera tener mayor posibilidad de ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Walter is a farmer who lives in his own house with his sister and three nieces.  He cultivates corn and chili and also raises livestock. He is requesting a loan to buy chili plants, fertilizer and pest treatment.  This loan will help him to plant this crop and harvest each year.  

He wants to improve his crops, producing more and thus be more likely to help his family.

loans.use: To buy chili plants, fertilizer and pest treatment.

loans.name: Zenobia

texts.es:
Zenobia  es socia del Banco Comunal “3 de Mayo” ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia  El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 30 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos.  Ella estudió cosmetología.
Zenobia es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora a trabajar con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, solicitará un préstamo por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en su negocio, ella ofrece el servicio de cosmetología, además se dedica a la venta  y recarga de celulares.  Con éste préstamo comprará accesorios para su salón de belleza y celulares.  Nos  cuenta que trabaja sola ya que su esposo trabaja en la mina. 
Su sueño es tener una empresa de reparación de celulares y vender accesorios al por mayor.
Lo que le  gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones con las socias ya que comparten experiencias  que le servirán para el futuro.
texts.en:
Zenobia is a member of the communal bank "3 de Mayo" [May 3rd] located in the llave [i-l-a-v-e] district in the province of El Collao and department of Puno. She is thirty years old, in a committed relationship, and has two children. She studied cosmetology in school. 

Zenobia is a new member who recently came to work with the Manuela Ramos Movement. She will be seeking a loan in the amount of 500 nuevos soles, money that she will invest in her business. She offers cosmetology services and in addition sells cell phones and cell phone minutes. 

With this loan she will buy accessories for her beauty salon and cell phones. She tells us that she works alone since her husband works in the mines. Her dream is to have a cell phone repair business and to sell accessories wholesale. 

What she likes about the communal bank are the meetings with the members, since they share experiences which will help her down the road.

loans.use: to purchase accessories for her beauty salon and cell phones.

loans.name: Anass

texts.en:
Anass, a 26-year-old single man, has owned a coffee shop for 3 years. He is a man with a good reputation, liked by all his customers, relatives and friends. Anass' coffee shop is well known in his region, and he works hard to improve it, keeping it up-to-date and attractive to all of his customers.
